msg:
Click to read. Swipe to dismiss.

Pullsh is a tool to help you to check and share text with short id between devices.
It is available on Android, https://pullsh.me, and Chrome Extension.

To create a memo (Push), swipe the pink action button to the left.
Input your memo, and click '+'. You will get a unique id for you memo.
You can also share text to Pullsh in Android to quickly create a push.

To read a memo (Pull), you can swipe the action button to the right.
Inpur the memo id, and click '+'. The memo will be added to the list.

You can alse create a push or pull on https://pullsh.me and using Pullsh Chrome Extension.
This help doc has the id 'help'. You can read it or share it with the id or, using the full path https://pullsh.me/help.
If the memo your want to share is a link, add '-' after the address for quickly access. e.g. https://pullsh.me/LiNk- will bring you the memo link address.

To keep your memo secure, you can use push config to add access control to your memo.
After the memo expired, or reaching maximum access counts, no one can read it anymore.
